description:
This market refers to the tennis match between Sho Shimabukuro and Adam Walton in the Delray Beach Open, Qualification, scheduled for February 15 2026.
This market will resolve to "Shimabukuro" if Sho Shimabukuro wins by 2 or more sets than Adam Walton, based on the final completed score. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Walton."
If the match begins but is not completed, this market will resolve 50-50. If the match is canceled before play begins or delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a result, this market will also resolve 50-50.
Resolution will be based on official ATP results.

events.description:
This market refers on the tennis match between Adam Walton and Sho Shimabukuro in the Delray Beach Open, Qualification, scheduled for February 15 at 1:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Walton' if Adam Walton advances against Sho Shimabukuro.

This market will resolve to 'Shimabukuro' if Sho Shimabukuro advances against Adam Walton.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match begins but is not completed, and one player advances due to the opponent's retirement, default, or disqualification, this market will resolve to the player who advances.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
events.title: Delray Beach Open, Qualification: Adam Walton vs Sho Shimabukuro

groupItemTitle: Delray Beach Open, Qualification: Adam Walton vs Sho Shimabukuro Set Handicap +/-1.5
question: Set Handicap: Shimabukuro (-1.5) vs Walton (+1.5)
